hero.title: Savor Every Moment
hero.subtitle: Experience Culinary Excellence
hero.description: Discover a world of flavors crafted with passion and served with love. From traditional recipes to modern innovations, every dish tells a story.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Passion Meets Perfection
about.content: Founded with a vision to bring authentic flavors and modern culinary artistry together, Savora has been delighting guests for over a decade. Our commitment to quality ingredients and exceptional service makes every meal memorable.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd Love to Hear from You
